name: Coffee House
description: A cozy neighborhood coffee shop serving premium coffee, pastries, and light meals. Perfect for morning coffee runs and afternoon work sessions.

name: TechMart Electronics
description: Electronics store specializing in smartphones, laptops, gadgets, and tech accessories. Offers the latest technology products and repair services.

name: GreenGrocer Market
description: Fresh produce market offering organic fruits, vegetables, dairy products, and pantry essentials. Known for locally sourced and sustainable products.

name: BookNook Library
description: Community library and bookstore with a vast collection of books, e-books, and reading spaces. Also hosts book clubs and author events.

name: FitZone Gym
description: Modern fitness center with state-of-the-art equipment, personal training services, group classes, and wellness programs.

name: FoodExpress Delivery
description: Food delivery service connecting customers with local restaurants. Fast delivery, wide variety of cuisines, and easy ordering.

name: Indigo Airlines
description: Indigo Airlines is a leading airline company that provides flights to various destinations. It is known for its affordable fares and on-time performance.

name: Air India
description: Air India is a leading airline company that provides flights to various destinations. It is known for its affordable fares and on-time performance.

name: Jet Airways
description: Jet Airways is a leading airline company that provides flights to various destinations. It is known for its affordable fares and on-time performance.

name: Amazon
description: Amazon is an online shopping platform that offers a wide range of products. It is known for its fast delivery and competitive prices.

name: Flipkart
description: Flipkart is an online shopping platform that offers a wide range of products. It is known for its fast delivery and competitive prices.
